descriptionHtml:
8/19/12 LSBRuneWeapons by Lord Banewrath Sunblade


       This mod adds 7 new weapons to the steel crafting list. Mostly just hammers that
have a one handed and two handed version and a spiked mace that is has two versions.
 I decided not to add them to lvld list because these will be included in my battlehammer
mod update and that mod adds items to the lists.But since that update will won`t be ready 
for awhile I thought I would release these and see how people like them in the meantime.


   Installation is as easy as always, drag and drop the contents of the supplied data folder
to your own data folder. When launching the game click the esp on and play.
author: Lord Banewrath Sunblade
